column1: :No actor is specified for the role of Dori.
:Dori is omitted; Thorin is the only companion of the player
:Dori has a long brown beard without moustache. He does not appear in the game until Lake-town
column2: though he can be seen in the fir tree with Bilbo
column3: much like the scene in the book.

column1: 2007: The Lord of the Rings Online:
:Dori is a non-playable character. He is captured along with the gems he was bringing to the Dwarves of Othrikar by the Dourhands. The player must rescue him in Vol I
column3: Chapter 4 "Freeing Dori". He also makes an appearance during the Dwarven Introduction quest line.
